alert.note: Alert for Custer (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 29 at 12:58PM MDT until further notice by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Idaho... Big Lost River at Howell Ranch near Chilly affecting Custer County. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/pocatello. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is possible. * WHERE...Big Lost River at Howell Ranch near Chilly. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 4.1 feet, Widespread lowland flooding from Howell Ranch downriver to the top of Mackay Reservoir. Fish Hatchery Road near Donahue Ranch may have water flowing over it. Canals and headgates may have problems. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:00 PM MDT Monday the stage was 3.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fluctuate over the next several days, but is expected to remain just below flood stage for now. - Flood stage is 4.1 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 4.0 feet on 06/06/2016. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 pm MDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Tue Wed Thu Big Lost River Howell Ranch near Chill 4.1 3.6 Mon 12 pm MD 3.4 3.5 3.6 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas.
